/*
    Presidents Source Code - Version 0.0.3

In this version of the development of the game, I have emulated player 
one mostly.  The only thing that needs to happen is to rearrange the 
code so that no bugs will be exploited.  Then, once organized, I'll 
just edit parts of it to create the very simple AI.
*/
#include <ctime>
#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    srand(time(NULL));
    system("cls");
    
    char deck[53];
    char card=50; int r; int temp; int i; int z=0;
    
    int turn=(rand()%3+1);  //choose who goes first
    char cardtype; //type of card played
    int cardnum; //number of card played by player
    int cardvalueplayed; //value of card so you can't go down played by player
    int cardvalueingame; //value of card on top of played stack
    int gameover=0; //gameover value
    int cardtypeinplay; //type of card in play
    int cardnuminplay; //number of cards in play
    int newround=1; //when to start a new round, default is to start
    int cardnuminhand=0; //delete cards from hand
    
    //fill deck with all the card values
    for(i=1; i<33; i++)
    {
        deck[i]=card;
        if(i%4==0)
        card++;
    }
    for(i=33; i<37; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='T';
    }
    for(i=37; i<41; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='J';
    }        
    for(i=41; i<45; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='Q';
    }
    for(i=45; i<49; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='K';
    }  
    for(i=49; i<53; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='A';
    }
    // fill deck[0] with a space
    deck[0]='0';
    //shuffle deck    
    for(i=1; i<53; i++)
    {
        r=(rand()%52)+1;
        temp=deck[i]; deck[i]=deck[r]; deck[r]=temp; 
    }
    z=0;
    
    //first player go
    while(gameover!=1)
    {
    
    switch(turn)
    {
        case 1: {
                    //display player's hand
                    cout << "Your hand:   ";
                    for(z=1; z<14; z++)
                      {
                        cout << " ";
                        switch(deck[z])
                          {
                            case '0': cout << " "; break;
                            case '3': cout << "3"; break;
                            case '4': cout << "4"; break;
                            case '5': cout << "5"; break;
                            case '6': cout << "6"; break;
                            case '7': cout << "7"; break;
                            case '8': cout << "8"; break;
                            case '9': cout << "9"; break;
                            case 'T': cout << "T"; break;
                            case 'J': cout << "J"; break;
                            case 'Q': cout << "Q"; break;
                            case 'K': cout << "K"; break;
                            case 'A': cout << "A"; break;
                            case '2': cout << "2"; break;
                          }
                      }
                cout << "\n\n";
                cout << "Which card will you play?  ";
                cin >> cardtype;
                //check for pass
                if(cardtype=='P')
                {
                    turn++;
                    break;
                }
                cout << "How many of this card?  ";
                cin >> cardnum;    
                
                //if a new round is started, add info on value and num
                if(newround==1)
                {
                    cardnuminplay=cardnum;
                    cardtypeinplay=cardtype;
                    newround--;
                }
                
                //check for card type and number
                for(i=1; i<14; i++)
                {
                    if(deck[i]==cardtype)
                    {
                        cardnuminhand++;
                        if(cardnuminhand==cardnum)
                        break;
                    }
                }
                
                //cardnuminplay=2;
                
                //check for correct number of cards played
                if(cardnuminplay!=cardnum)
                {
                    cout << "You must play the correct number of cards./n/n";
                }    
                
                if(cardtype=='3')
                cardvalueplayed=1;
                if(cardtype=='4')
                cardvalueplayed=2;
                if(cardtype=='5')
                cardvalueplayed=3;
                if(cardtype=='6')
                cardvalueplayed=4;
                if(cardtype=='7')
                cardvalueplayed=5;
                if(cardtype=='8')
                cardvalueplayed=6;
                if(cardtype=='9')
                cardvalueplayed=7;
                if(cardtype=='T')
                cardvalueplayed=8;
                if(cardtype=='J')
                cardvalueplayed=9;
                if(cardtype=='Q')
                cardvalueplayed=10;
                if(cardtype=='K')
                cardvalueplayed=11;
                if(cardtype=='A')
                cardvalueplayed=12;
                if(cardtype=='2')
                cardvalueplayed=13;
                
                //cardvalueingame=5;
                
                //if no new round has begun, play cards
                if(newround==0)
                {
                    //check for twos, if twos are played, begin new round
                    if(cardvalueplayed==13)
                    {
                        newround=1; turn=1;
                        break;
                    }    
                    if(cardvalueingame<cardvalueplayed)
                    {
                        cardvalueingame=cardvalueplayed;
                    }
                    else if(cardvalueingame>cardvalueplayed)
                    {
                        cout << "You must play a higher card./n/n";
                    }        
                }    
                
                //delete cards from hand 
                for(i=1; i<14; i++)
                {
                    if(cardnum!=0)
                    {
                        if(deck[i]==cardtype)
                          {
                            deck[i]='0';
                            --cardnum;
                          }
                    }                
                }
                //check for gameover
                for(i=1; i<14; i++)
                {
                    if(deck[i]!=0)
                    {
                        gameover=0;
                        break;
                    }    
                    gameover=1;
                }    
                         
                turn++;
                break;
                }    
        case 2: //cpu deck[14-26]
                {
                    if(newround==1)
                    {
                        cardnuminplay=cardnum;
                        cardtypeinplay=cardtype;
                        newround--;
                    }
                    system("cls");
                    cout << "Player two's go\n\n";
                    turn++;
                    break;
                }  
        case 3: //cpu deck[27-39]
                {
                    if(newround==1)
                    {
                        cardnuminplay=cardnum;
                        cardtypeinplay=cardtype;
                        newround--;
                    }
                    cout << "Player three's go\n\n";
                    turn++;
                    break;
                }  
        case 4: //cpu deck[40-52]
                {
                    if(newround==1)
                    {
                        cardnuminplay=cardnum;
                        cardtypeinplay=cardtype;
                        newround--;
                    }
                    cout << "Player four's go\n\n";
                    turn=1;
                    break;
                }
    }
}        

    return 0;
}
